definition: Tangshan prefecture-level city in Hebei/China (a name for China used by some overseas Chinese)
Tang dynasty (618-907)/surname Tang
to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
Tangshan prefecture level city in Hebei
Tangshan county (old name)
Great Tangshan Earthquake (1976)

sentences.english: Zhaoqing visit old tin work, say to want to buy back his'll, send him back to the tangshan.
sentences.chinese: 肇慶探望老錫工，說要買回他的賣身契，送他回唐山。

sentences.english: Graduated from the Tangshan Coal Medical College Medical University, became a doctor 30 years.
sentences.chinese: 畢業於唐山煤礦醫學院醫療系，從醫三十多年。

sentences.english: His grandfather roamed over the earthquake in Tangshan for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 他的祖父東拉西扯地談了半天唐山的地震。

sentences.english: A memorial park built on the ruins of a deadly earthquake that killed more than 240000 people in 1976 will open to the public Wednesday in Tangshan, Hebei.
sentences.chinese: 唐山地震遺址紀念公園將於30日向社會開放。

sentences.english: Constructs the Tangshan medicine station above this foundation to supply the chain to transform the practice.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎之上構建唐山醫藥站供應鏈變革實踐。

sentences.english: Twenty years has passed since Tangshan was hit by earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 唐山遭受地震以來二十多年已經過去了。

sentences.english: Tangshan in my eyes is an inspiring city.
sentences.chinese: 唐山在我眼中是座催人奮進的城市。

sentences.english: At this time, zhaoqing received from tangshan send workers letter.
sentences.chinese: 就在此時，肇慶收到了從唐山寄給勞工們的信。

sentences.english: Zhu shopkeeper Tangshan rich, people, ancestors to make tofu business.
sentences.chinese: 朱掌櫃是唐山豐潤人，祖上就做豆腐生意。

sentences.english: 10 years afther the quake, the rebuilding of Tangshan was basically complete.
sentences.chinese: 震後10年，唐山的重建工作基本完成。

sentences.english: Today Tangshan is turning out large quantities of fine porcelain.
sentences.chinese: 今天唐山已能生產大量的細瓷了。

sentences.english: A terrible earthquake took place in Tangshan several years ago. A terrible earthquake happened in Tangshan several years ago.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前唐山發生了一場可怕的地震。

sentences.english: Have a century of history, along with the Tangshanma tang .
sentences.chinese: 擁有上百年曆史，與唐山麻糖齊名。

sentences.english: Volunteer from Tangshan contributes a lot to the nursing house.
sentences.chinese: 來自唐山的義工們爲養老院做出了很多貢獻。

sentences.english: Tangshan in the eyes of the public is an inspiring city.
sentences.chinese: 唐山在衆人眼中是座催人奮進的城市。

sentences.english: The towering Earthquake Monument bears witness to the history of Tangshan's reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 高高聳立的抗震紀念碑見證着唐山重建的歷史。

Zhangjiakou prefecture level city in Hebei

Xinji county level city in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei
